sentences.sContent: I must report your lateness to the teacher.
sentences.sContent_eng: I must report your lateness to the teacher.
sentences.sCn: 我必须报告老师你迟到了。

sentences.sContent: I remember that rich bass voice hanging in the night air, making some elaborate operatic point despite the lateness of the hour - and the train.
sentences.sContent_eng: I remember that rich bass voice hanging in the night air, making some elaborate operatic point despite the lateness of the hour - and the train.
sentences.sCn: 尽管那次时间已经很晚，再加上火车的隆隆声，我还记得那饱满的低音弥漫在夜空之中，详尽地阐述他关于歌剧的看法 。

sentences.sContent: The guesthouse in Nanshao was the most pleasant we have come across, run by a welcoming Miao family who despite the lateness of the hour gave us hot water for our feet and hot food for our bellies.
sentences.sContent_eng: The guesthouse in Nanshao was the most pleasant we have come across, run by a welcoming Miao family who despite the lateness of the hour gave us hot water for our feet and hot food for our bellies.
sentences.sCn: 南哨的旅馆是我们遇到的最友善的旅馆，由一家好客的苗族人经营。 尽管那天已经很晚，主人还是为我们的双脚提供了热水，为我们的肚子提供了热饭。

words.tran: 晚的；迟的；已故的；最近的
